name: Chicken & Mandarin Salad
description: Piled high with crunchy noodles, tender chicken cubes and juicy mandarins tossed in a zesty dressing, this salad is a filling yet refreshing one-bowl meal.

ingredients.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix or Greek Dressing Mix
chow mein noodles or hard-shelled, gluten-free tacos

preparation: In a Round or Multipurpose Steamer, cook chicken or tofu for 4–6 min. Set aside.
In a large bowl, combine dressing ingredients.
Add chicken, mandarins, lettuce, carrots, and bean sprouts to large bowl. Toss until well coated.
Portion into 4 serving bowls; top each bowl with almonds and chow mein noodles. Enjoy!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: Fresh, bright & bold blend of Mediterranean herbs with notes of garlic & rosemary. Our most versatile dressing.

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
